alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 9:48AM CDT until March 31 at 10:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Montgomery and Elmore Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Property around Red Eagle Honor Farm floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 33.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 33.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Friday morning and continue falling to 13.3 feet by Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
